## isEmail

Assert string type and valid email. The max length of email is 128 characters

### Parameters

-   `value`  

Returns **[boolean][5]** 

## isEmailOrEmpty

Assert string type, empty string or valid email. The max length of email is 128 characters

### Parameters

-   `value`  

Returns **[boolean][5]**
